text: NPR this morning did the ultimate unforgivable "both sides" horse-race-manship -- they labeled people who support Roe v Wade as extremists and wondered if such extremism will cause the Democrats to lose in November. The reporter and interviewer was a young black woman. We have to increase the number of justices on the Supreme Court in January 2023. I want to hear Democratic candidates say that, specifically. Codifying Roe is not enough. I simply won't support any candidate that doesn't support reforming the court. So imho -- wanting to get back to Roe is far from extreme. It isn't nearly extreme enough.
